Sure!  For another angle, please grab RetriedAssert.java and
RetriedAssertTest.java from
 <http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/src/>
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/junit/files/src/.
 
Kevin
 

-----Original Message-----
From: Yishay Mor [mailto:ymor@...]
Sent: Monday, June 04, 2001 1:50 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Event testing?


Hi,

Any ideas as to how to write test cases for asynchronous calls?

This is our scenario: We have code which sends out an SNMP request. We then
register a listener, which is waken when the response has arrived and has
been processed. The only idea I could think of was to register, invoke,
wait() and have the event handler notify(). Any cleaner patterns?

- Yishay
